/wiki/Claudio_B\u00f6ckli: Claudio Böckli ( born 20 June 1984 ) is a retired Swiss biathlete . He competed at the Biathlon World Championships 2012 in Ruhpolding and at the Biathlon World Championships 2013 in Nove Mesto na Morave . He competed at the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi , in the individual contest .
/wiki/Biathlon_at_the_2014_Winter_Olympi: The men 's individual competition of the Sochi 2014 Olympics was held at Laura Biathlon & Ski Complex on 13 February 2014 . The gold medal was won by Martin Fourcade , France , the silver medal by Erik Lesser , Germany and the bronze medal was won by Evgeniy Garanichev , Russia .
/wiki/Simon_Hallenbarter: Simon Hallenbarter ( born 5 March 1979 ) is a retired Swiss biathlete . He has represented Switzerland at two Olympics - 2006 Winter Olympics and 2010 Winter Olympics . Hallenbarter finished 16th in the men 's 10 kilometres sprint at the 2010 Olympics . He started to compete in biathlon in 2002 . Hallenbarter retired from the sport at the end of the 2013-14 season .
/wiki/Ivan_Joller: Ivan Joller ( born 24 April 1983 ) is a former Swiss biathlete . He competed at the Biathlon World Championships 2012 in Ruhpolding and at the Biathlon World Championships 2013 in Nove Mesto na Morave . He competed at the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi , in the individual contest .
/wiki/Benjamin_Weger: Benjamin Weger ( born October 5 , 1989 ) is a Swiss biathlete . His first World Cup podium was in the Pokljuka 20 km individual 16 December 2010 .
/wiki/Biathlon_at_the_2014_Winter_Olympi: The men 's sprint competition of the Sochi 2014 Olympics was held at Laura Biathlon & Ski Complex on 8 February 2014 . It was 10 kilometres in length ( 6.2 miles ) . The defending Olympic Champion is Vincent Jay of France , who has since retired . The defending World Champion is Emil Hegle Svendsen of Norway .
/wiki/Serafin_Wiestner: Serafin Wiestner ( born ) , is a Swiss biathlete . He competed in the 2014 Winter Olympics for Switzerland where he finished 40th in the sprint .
/wiki/Biathlon_at_the_2014_Winter_Olympi: The men 's pursuit competition of the Sochi 2014 Olympics was held at Laura Biathlon & Ski Complex on 10 February 2014 . Martin Fourcade won the gold medal .

The men 's relay competition of the Sochi 2014 Olympics was held at Laura Biathlon & Ski Complex on 22 February 2014 . On 15 February 2020 , it was announced that because of a doping violation Evgeny Ustyugov and Russian relay team had been disqualified from the 2014 Olympics . There is no official decision by IOC yet .
